name: Market
description: A bustling marketplace where traders and merchants gather to buy and sell goods.
initialState: Busy market stalls with vendors calling out their wares.

name: Tavern
description: A warm gathering place where travelers can rest and locals share news.
initialState: Cozy tavern with flickering candlelight and comfortable seating.

name: Workshop
description: A skilled craftsman's workshop where equipment is commissioned and repaired.
initialState: Well-equipped workshop with tools and materials for crafting.

name: Logging Camp
description: A forest camp where loggers harvest timber and gather forest resources.
initialState: Active logging site with timber stacks and forest workers.

name: Tavern
description: A rustic tavern where forest workers gather to rest and share stories.
initialState: Rough-hewn tavern with the smell of wood smoke and ale.

name: Village Market
description: A small but bustling market where forest goods and supplies are traded.
initialState: Wooden stalls filled with lumber, herbs, and forest produce.

name: Market
description: A large trading market where goods from multiple regions are bought and sold.
initialState: Busy trading hub with merchants from across the region.

name: Workshop
description: A professional workshop offering skilled crafting and equipment services.
initialState: Professional workshop with advanced tools and equipment.

name: Dock
description: A waterfront dock where fish are brought in and water transport is arranged.
initialState: Busy dock with boats, nets, and the fresh smell of river water.

name: Noble Quarter
description: An exclusive district where aristocrats reside and conduct their affairs.
initialState: Elegant mansions and manicured gardens, with guards at every entrance.

name: Hidden Wharf
description: A secluded dock known only to those involved in less legitimate trade.
initialState: Shadowy pier hidden beneath overhanging buildings, quiet except for occasional whispers.

name: Deep Woods
description: The heart of the forest where few venture and strange folk dwell.
initialState: Ancient trees block most sunlight, creating a perpetual twilight beneath their canopy.

name: Merchant Guild
description: The powerful guild hall where major trade deals are negotiated.
initialState: Imposing stone building with the guild's seal prominently displayed.

name: River Docks
description: Busy commercial docks where barges load and unload cargo.
initialState: Constant activity as cargo moves between barges and warehouses.

name: Library
description: A small but well-maintained library where scholars and nobles conduct research.
initialState: Quiet halls lined with books, with reading tables lit by oil lamps.
